moduleMetadataJson.name: SSL Labs API Client
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module is a simple client for the SSL Labs APIs, designed for
          SSL/TLS assessment during a penetration test.
author: Denis Kolegov <dnkolegov@gmail.com>
Francois Chagnon

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: DELAY
options.description: The delay in seconds between  API requests

options.name: USECACHE
options.description: Use cached results (if available), else force live scan

options.name: IGNOREMISMATCH
options.description: Proceed with assessments even when the server certificate doesn't match the assessment hostname
